focusBody: I build scalable, production-ready AI and ML systems that bridge data science and engineering. My work emphasizes repeatable MLOps practices, robust pipeline design, and measurable business impact in analytics and forecasting domains.
currentlyItems: Designing and operating end-to-end AI/ML pipelines on GCP, Databricks, and Vertex AI.
Standardizing governance, monitoring, and deployment frameworks for reliable production delivery.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to operationalize models with performance visibility and alerting.
